2.11 Nutritional care and support of HIV-infected children 6 months

WHO RECOMMENDATION
Children living with HIV should be assessed, classified and managed according to a 
nutrition care plan to cover their nutrient needs associated with the presence of HIV and 
nutritional status and to ensure appropriate growth and development ( 151).
